# Right Track Physiotherapy & Performance Centre

> Evidence-based physiotherapy, sports rehabilitation, and clinical Pilates in Nicosia, Cyprus. GESY-registered healthcare provider.

## About
Right Track is a physiotherapy and performance centre founded by Antonis Petri. We specialize in helping athletes and individuals recover from injuries and improve their physical performance using evidence-based methods.

## Services
- Physiotherapy (GESY registered)
- Clinical Pilates
- Athlete-centred Rehabilitation
- Sports & Remedial Massage
- Performance Training
- Kids Physiotherapy
- Home-care Physiotherapy

## Team
- Antonis Petri - Lead Clinician & Founder, BSc Physiotherapy, Clinical Practice Supervisor at Frederick University
- Alice Kazanjian - Physiotherapist & Clinical Pilates Instructor, BSc Physiotherapy, 8+ years experience
- Charalambos Gregoriou - Physiotherapist & Personal Trainer, BSc Physiotherapy

## Location
Tseriou 32
Strovolos 2042
Nicosia, Cyprus

## Hours
Monday - Friday: 08:00 - 20:00
Saturday: 09:00 - 14:00
Sunday: Closed
